StoredProcedureOraclev10g.name: GET_OBSERVACIONES_DETALLE
StoredProcedureOraclev10g.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PROCEDURE CONSULTOR3.GET_OBSERVACIONES_DETALLE (
VAR_ID_DET_VERSION IN NUMBER,
CUR_RPTA OUT sys_refcursor)AS
BEGIN

SAVEPOINT obtenerResultados;

OPEN CUR_RPTA FOR
SELECT A.ID_OBSERVACIONES, A.ID_DET,A.OBSERVACION, A.OBS_USR_REG,
A.OSB_FEC_REG,A.OBS_USR_RES,A.OBS_FEC_RES, A.OBS_RES
FROM T_OBSERVACIONES A
WHERE A.ID_DET=VAR_ID_DET_VERSION
ORDER BY A.OSB_FEC_REG DESC;

EXCEPTION
WHEN OTHERS THEN

ROLLBACK TO obtenerResultados;
RAISE;
END;
StoredProcedureOraclev10g.body:
CREATE OR REPLACE PROCEDURE CONSULTOR3.GET_OBSERVACIONES_DETALLE (
VAR_ID_DET_VERSION IN NUMBER,
CUR_RPTA OUT sys_refcursor)AS
BEGIN

SAVEPOINT obtenerResultados;

OPEN CUR_RPTA FOR
SELECT A.ID_OBSERVACIONES, A.ID_DET,A.OBSERVACION, A.OBS_USR_REG,
A.OSB_FEC_REG,A.OBS_USR_RES,A.OBS_FEC_RES, A.OBS_RES
FROM T_OBSERVACIONES A
WHERE A.ID_DET=VAR_ID_DET_VERSION
ORDER BY A.OSB_FEC_REG DESC;

EXCEPTION
WHEN OTHERS THEN

ROLLBACK TO obtenerResultados;
RAISE;
END;
